# AI Context Templates & Personal Folders

## Templates
Copy `CLAUDE.template.md` → `CLAUDE.md` (gitignore'd) and `GEMINI.template.md` → `GEMINI.md` in root.

Customize paths/sites/models for your setup. These provide architecture guidance for Claude Code/Gemini CLI.

## Personal Folders (gitignore'd - Create Manually or Let AI Create)
- `/tasks/`: Todos/verification (e.g., MCP tests, plugin verification)
- `/projects/`: Docs/sub-projects (e.g., ai-editor.md, geekline-feed-plugin.md)
- `/tmp/`, `/data/`: Runtime data
- `/logs/`: Logs (already gitignore'd)

AI agents/tools (Claude Code, smart-folder-manager) can auto-create/populate as needed. Manual setup optional for custom workflows.
